ygData.subject: Re: Looking for Item
ygData.msgSnippet: It might be a summoned shield. You should be able to right click it and get a description from it. Chris aka Thunderheart Level 21 Wood-Elf Druid Innoruuk
ygData.messageBody:
It might be a summoned shield. You should be able to right click it and get
a description from it.

Chris aka Thunderheart
Level 21
Wood-Elf
Druid
Innoruuk server
---=== Divine Wind ===---

-----Original Message-----
From: MFerrulo@... [mailto:MFerrulo@...]
Sent: Sunday, May 30, 1999 1:57 PM
To: Everquest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Looking for Item
From: MFerrulo@...

I have seen one PC and one NPC that have what looks like a glowing, flashing

shield on thier left arm. When I inspected the PC with this flashing thing
going on, she had a "Light Globe" (not Lightstone) in one of her melee
slots,
so I assume it was not a shiled but rather a light source. I really wanna
try to get one of these Light Globes. Any one know where I can?

Wizaro
